paper_abstract: According to the three classifications of nucleotides, we divided the sixteen neighboring dual nucleotides into four classes. We associated each sequence with the relative frequencies of the (trial nucleotides in cacti class, and obtain a sixteen-component vector relative to sixteen dual nucleotides. The introduced vector is applied to characterize and compare the coding sequences of the first exon of beta-globin gene belonging to eleven species.
paper_title: A novel method for sequence similarity analysis based on the relative frequency of dual nucleotides
